setting.location: Merchant's private office behind textile shop, Warsaw commercial district, mahogany-furnished business quarters

characters.appearance: Man in early 40s, dark hair, suddenly alert expression, gripping letter
characters.clothing: Business attire - black coat, grey vest, white shirt
characters.position: Standing behind desk, holding opened letter
characters.action: Reading with intense focus, hand trembling slightly

characters.appearance: Young male clerk in his 20s, eager face, neat appearance
characters.clothing: Simple brown suit, white shirt, black tie
characters.action: Watching his employer with curious concern

scene.mainElements: Elegant office with merchant reading letter that has clearly affected him deeply, ornate desk covered with business papers, young clerk witnessing the moment
scene.details: Mahogany desk with green leather inlay, crystal inkwell, scattered invoices and ledgers, letter with elaborate wax seal broken, portrait of serious man on wall, filing cabinets, comfortable leather chairs, abacus on side table, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Bookshelves with account books, window showing grey Warsaw day, connecting door to shop
scene.atmosphere: Sudden tension and anticipation, a moment of dramatic change breaking routine

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot capturing both the merchant's reaction and clerk's concern
composition.focus: The merchant's intense expression as he reads the pivotal letter
composition.depth: Merchant at desk in foreground, clerk in doorway middle ground, office details in background
